Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This remarkable item holds immense value to me and is worth $1500000 to you. After careful consideration, I am offering it to you at a special price of $1400000. This represents an exceptional value, considering its true worth and the benefits it offers. I trust this proposal aligns well with your expectations and financial planning. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of facilitating this transaction. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,400,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,400,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,500,000
